translation.text_rate: Dollar exchange rates Today there are several exchange rates, including the dollar: 1. Official rate — is established by the Central Bank of the Republic of Uzbekistan and is updated weekly. Currently, the official dollar to soum exchange rate is 1 dollar = 12 640,87 sum, 100 dollar = 1 264 087 sum. 2. Market rate — is formed depending on the real situation on the foreign exchange market. On this site you can find the most up-to-date information about changes in this rate and its average value. Currently, in banks, one dollar is sold for approximately 12,740.00 sum, and bought for 12,640.00 sum. 3. Exchange rate — used on exchanges and is not of interest to us.
